Will Ubuntu run well on a Macbook pro?: depends on how new.. a friend of mine put ubuntu on a macbook pro.. had a LOT of problems
you might have some issues, i believe hers is like one of the newest available (she got it like 4-5mo ago)

something you should note... my friend, could not get a USB to boot on her Macbook... she actually had to create a USB, and a CD, in order to use a linux live session.  It's documented if you do some searching (again.. very new macbook)
